title: JSON schema for FundingBody
description: JSON Schema to validate JSON payloads for the upload of  API,

awardeePersonId.description: Generated identifier for the researcher (FundingBodyAwardId_P_Index). P denotes this is a Person

familyName.description: The family name of a Person

fundingBodyPersonId.description: Id of the researcher as provided by the funder for disambiguation purposes

givenName.description: The given name of a Person

name.description: Name as it appears on the source

role.description: Role of the researcher in this award or project

AmountWithCurrency.title: AmountWithCurrency
AmountWithCurrency.description: Amount with currency as per ISO codes

activityType.description: Type of organisation activity, i.e. research organisation, industry, etc.

affiliationOf.description: Researchers within the institution who received the award or will work on the funded project

awardeeAffiliationId.description: Generated identifier for the awardee affiliated institution (FundingBodyAwardId_A_Index). A denotes this is Affiliation Institution

fundingBodyOrganizationId.description: Id of the awarded institution as provided by the funder for disambiguation purposes

link.description: A URL link pointing to a institutional homepage

role.description: Role of the awarded institution in the project

vatNumber.description: VAT identification number. It is mainly used within the EU

AwardDataset.title: AwardDataset
AwardDataset.description: Container for operational data concerning Award record

fundingTotal.description: Total funding assigned to the project via this award. Should be sum of the yearly installments

financialYearEnd.description: End year of the funding (normally financial year)

financialYearStart.description: Start year of the funding (normally financial year)

fundedAmount.description: How much money was awarded in this particular period

index.description: Index on the year of financial support

AwardSuccessRate.title: AwardSuccessRate
AwardSuccessRate.description: Percentage of successful grant applications out of all grant applications for an FB

description.description: Should now contain a URL to make sure we know where the text is coming from

EstablishmentInfo.title: EstablishmentInfo
EstablishmentInfo.description: Information about how and when and where an organisation was founded

acronym.description: Acronym of the project this award is funding

budget.description: Total project cost (irrespective whether funded or not)

fundingBodyProjectId.description: ID of the project that is funded as defined by the funding organisation

hasPart.description: If of the sub-project that is funded as defined by the funding organisation

link.description: A URL link pointing to a project page or to the funder page with further details about the funded project

title.description: Title of the project this award is funding

budget.description: Total (sub)project cost (irrespective whether funded or not)

fundingBodyProjectId.description: Id of the (sub)project that is funded as defined by the funding organisation

FundedSubprojectDetail.title: FundedSubprojectDetail
FundedSubprojectDetail.description: Details of a subproject for a funded project

activityType.description: Type of organisation by realised activity

country.description: Country of the organisation headquarters (ISO 3166-1 alpha-3). Should be lowercase

description.description: Description of the funding body activities. Needs to have a URL to point to where the description is placed on the web

financeType.description: Type of organisation by type of financing

fundingBodyId.description: Funder identifier (orgDbId), generated by content provider

fundingPolicy.description: Description of the funding policy. What is in scope and what is out of scope when it comes to funding

identifier.description: Container for referencing other organisational identifiers

profitabilityType.description: Whether an organisation is proft or non-profit

state.description: Region in a federal setting for the headquarter of the organisation

status.description: Whether a funding body is active or inactive

FundingBodyDataset.title: FundingBodyDataset
FundingBodyDataset.description: Container for operational data concerning funding body record

FundingBodyRelation.title: FundingBodyRelation
FundingBodyRelation.description: Information about hierarchy relations or relations with other organisations

state.description: State code only applicable to USA, Canada and Australia

captureEnd.description: When data capture from this source ended

captureStart.description: When data capture from this source started

comment.description: Free text field to capturing comments regarding starting or ending a specific source

status.description: Status of usage of the indicated source URL

description.description: Description of the financial and non-financial benefits that the awardee would gain

OpportunityAssociatedAmount.title: OpportunityAssociatedAmount
OpportunityAssociatedAmount.description: Monetary amount to be granted under this funding opportunity

OpportunityDataset.title: OpportunityDataset
OpportunityDataset.description: Container for operational data concerning Opportunity record

description.description: Expected duration of project or activity that will be funded

durationExpression.description: Standardised expression of the duration in machine-readable form

abstract.value: Proposals may only be submitted by the following: Institutions of Higher Education (IHEs) - Two- and four-year IHEs (including community colleges) accredited in, and having a campus located in the US, acting on behalf of their faculty members. Special Instructions for International Branch Campuses of US IHEs: If the proposal includes funding to be provided to an international branch campus of a US institution of higher education (including through use of subawards and consultant arrangements), the proposer must explain the benefit(s) to the project of performance at the international branch campus, and justify why the project activities cannot be performed at the US campus.

description.description: Description of who is eligible to apply for this opportunity

OpportunityEligibilityClassification.title: OpportunityEligibilityClassification
OpportunityEligibilityClassification.description: Eligibility categories defined by Elsevier that best describe this funding opportunity eligibility criteria. The categories are annotated by the data provider based on eligibility description on the funding opportunity announcement.

OpportunityEligibilityClassificationCiti.title: OpportunityEligibilityClassificationCitizenship
OpportunityEligibilityClassificationCiti.description: Indication of citizneship related requirements for the funding opportunity

OpportunityEligibilityClassificationIndi.title: OpportunityEligibilityClassificationIndividualEligibility
OpportunityEligibilityClassificationIndi.description: Indication whether inidividual researchers are eligible to apply for the funding opportunity

abstract.value: Requests for grants through the competitive cycles are limited to one proposal per organization per calendar year

OpportunityEligibilityClassificationLimi.title: OpportunityEligibilityClassificationLimitedSubmission
OpportunityEligibilityClassificationLimi.description: A limited submission opportunity is an opportunity for which thefunding body restricts the number of applications that may be submitted by each entity (that is institution, state, or country)

OpportunityEligibilityClassificationOrga.title: OpportunityEligibilityClassificationOrganisationEligibility
OpportunityEligibilityClassificationOrga.description: Indication whether organisations are eligible to apply for the funding opportunity

OpportunityEligibilityClassificationRegi.title: OpportunityEligibilityClassificationRegionSpecific
OpportunityEligibilityClassificationRegi.description: Indication whether awarded researcher(s) or organisation(s) are required to be located somewhere in particular

OpportunityEligibilityClassificationRest.title: OpportunityEligibilityClassificationRestrictionScope
OpportunityEligibilityClassificationRest.description: Indication that applications are restricted to very specific applicant categories

OpportunityOpportunityDate.title: OpportunityOpportunityDate
OpportunityOpportunityDate.description: Dates relevant for opportunity application cycles

OpportunityRelatedOpportunity.title: OpportunityRelatedOpportunity
OpportunityRelatedOpportunity.description: Indication of relations that the funding opportunity has concerning other funding opportunity announcements

familyName.description: The family name of a Person

givenName.description: The given name of a Person

honorific.description: Honorific or title associated with a Person

middleName.description: The middle name of a Person

addressLocality.description: The locality such as the settlement name, city or town

addressPostalCode.description: A series of letters, digits or both the specifies a geographic location included in a postal address

addressRegion.description: The administrative region, state or area used

postOfficeBoxNumber.description: A uniquely addressable lockable box located on the premises of a post office station included in a postal address

streetAddress.description: The location of a building, apartment or other structure on a street, inlcuding the house number if available

contactPoint.description: contact e-mail address of the supplier that can be used to address about any kind of issues with the record

createdOn.description: Date when the record was created (as per supplier CMS)

defunct.description: Value TRUE means that the record has been tagged as invalid and not for use by the products

hidden.description: Value TRUE means that the record will not be displayed on the customer facing products

lastUpdateOn.description: Date when the record was updated (as per supplier CMS)

status.description: Status of the record. When the record is first created it gets status new. All records that get an update should have status update. Records that have been created erroneously can be tagged as "delete" on Elsevier's consent

wasAttributedTo.description: Identifier of the data provider for the record

PublicationDataset.title: PublicationDataset
PublicationDataset.description: Container for operational data concerning Publication record

description.description: Description text that refers to the award relation

fundingBodyAwardId.description: Id of the related award defined by funding organisation

fundingBodyProjectId.description: Project ID defined by the funding organisation

grantAwardId.description: Elsevier internal idenitifer of the related award

fundingBodyId.description: Elsevier identifier of the related funder

description.example: This opportunity is related to Solicitation 18-574
description.description: Description text that refers to the oppportunity relation

fundingBodyOpportunityId.description: Id of the related opportunity defined by funding organisation

grantOpportunityId.description: Elsevier internal idenitifer of the related opportunity

RelatedOpportunityWithDescription.title: RelatedOpportunityWithDescription
RelatedOpportunityWithDescription.description: Dates relevant for opportunity application cycles

StringWithLanguageAndSource.title: StringWithLanguageAndSource
StringWithLanguageAndSource.description: Description with language and source link
